text: are we gonna trade one of these a-holes, or what?
Lillard?
:pray:
(trade CJ)
Only for PG
Not Jimmie
I'd do CJ for PG straight up
*But he has to agree to an extension
Can we put evan turner in the trunk of a car?
I’d be happy with just that
Yeah. Pacers have to take Evan Turner too
fuck that guy
I'd also do one of our firsts for Okafor
I don’t know - i think Okafor is overhyped
Yeah. But he's also still super young. And we have 3 first rounders. So, I'd be willing to take the risk that he'll grow into his hype
i have him stashed on my fantasy. he seems to be a stat stuffer when given the playing time, but i've never watched him play
Patrick Beverly would also be a good pick-up. We need that hard-nosed d
I would love to pick up some front court d
Yeah. I can't believe the Pelicans got Cousins for essentially what we got for Plumlee
Nurkic might even be better than Hield
the ringer likes Noah coming to PDX, which I’d be down for
it’s not life changing
but it’d be an upgrade
honestly though, I sorta feel like we need to stop retooling to try to win now
I’d rather blow this all up and try to figure out how to land some foundational piece to play will lillard
even if it costs us a couple seasons
totally. my fear is that olshea is too proud of himself to deal CJ
yeah - I worry about that too
Unless Olshea can work some sort of dark magic that lets us keep both AND get the cornerstone front court piece, it seems like the Lillard/CJ combo might doom us to an 8th seed ceiling forever
which sucks, because we essential did exactly what the Blazers HAVE to do. Find gems through the draft.
god, i just want something big. and i know it's going to be some mid-level exception type deal. and it'll probably be another white dude
I assume it will be steve blake
forever
until he dies on the court
Hahaha
but back to your point, it stings - but one of the reasons it’s so great to draft gems is that they’re cheap to flip into something you need
and free agents are not coming here
ever
we basically have two of the same player. It’s not great, but it’s the least bad way to have to make a trade
no
free agents hate us like we’re sacramento
hedo turkoglu was even like, nah...
hedo fucking turkoglu

Via ESPN Marc Stein
One league source told ESPN’s Ramona Shelburne that the Portland Trail Blazers called to inquire about Drummond but quickly abandoned their interest when Detroit asked for Blazers guard C.J. McCollum in return. The Blazers, sources told Shelburne, regard McCollum as an untouchable.
fuck
welp
Good. I wouldn't want to do CJ from Drummond
Now Harkless and a 1st. Thats a different story.
Through Turner in there for good measure
trade everyone
Damn - I would have bit on that Drummond trade
